title: Performance Web Vital Event Data
description: Data payload for the performance.web_vital event. Fired when a Core Web Vitals or related performance metric is measured.

name.description: The name of the web vital metric.

value.description: The measured value of the metric.

rating.description: The qualitative rating of the metric based on Web Vitals thresholds.

delta.description: The change in value since the last report of this metric.

navigationType.description: The type of navigation, e.g. navigate, reload, back-forward.
